Bos Pertamina Merapat ke Kantor Erick Thohir, Bahas Apa?
04 Nov 2019, 04:02 by Achmad Dwi Afriyadi


Direktur Utama Pertamina Nicke Widyawati ke Kementerian BUMN/Foto: Achmad Dwi Afriyadi

Jakarta - Direktur Utama PT Pertamina (Persero) Nicke Widyawati merapat ke Kementerian Badan Usaha Milik Negara (BUMN) hari ini. Ia merapat sekitar pukul 10.30 WIB.Berdasarkan pantauan detikcom, Senin (4/11/2019), Nicke mengenakan kemeja warna putih dan celana warna hitam. Orang nomor satu Pertamina ini mengenakan kerudung warna merah muda.Belum diketahui maksud tujuan Nicke ke Kantor Menteri BUMN Erick Thohir ini. Ia sempat bersalaman dengan tamu yang juga ke Kementerian BUMN, lalu langsung masuk gedung.Perlu diketahui, Pertamina menjadi salah prioritas Erick. Lantaran, Pertamina akan mengembangkan Kilang Cilacap bersama Saudi Aramco.Erick sebelumnya menargetkan kesepakatan pengembangan Kilang Cilacap antara Pertamina dan Saudi Aramco berlangsung pada Desember 2019. Jika tidak, maka pemerintah akan mencari alternatif lain untuk pengembangan kilang ini. Salah satu solusinya akan mencari mitra baru untuk Pertamina."Sampai Desember kita lihat, sepakat atau tidak. Kalau nggak kita cari alternatif lain," kata Erick usai rapat di Kementerian Koordinator Bidang Kemaritiman dan Investasi, Jakarta, Selasa (29/10/2019)."Bisa cari partner lain juga, tapi kita usahakan yang sudah disepakati kedua negara," sambung Erick.Simak Video "WNA Pekerja Proyek Kereta Cepat Tewas dalam Kebakaran Pipa Pertamina"[Gambas:Video 20detik](ara/ara)

Pertamina Boss Clings to Erick Thohir's Office, Discuss What?
Nov 04 2019, 04:02 by Achmad Dwi Afriyadi


Pertamina President Director Nicke Widyawati to the Ministry of BUMN / Photo: Achmad Dwi Afriyadi

Jakarta - President Director of PT Pertamina (Persero) Nicke Widyawati approached the Ministry of State-Owned Enterprises (BUMN) today. He docked at around 10.30 WIB. Based on the monitoring of AFP on Monday (11/04/2019), Nicke wore a white shirt and black pants. The number one Pertamina is wearing a pink veil. Not yet known the purpose of Nicke to the Office of SOE Minister Erick Thohir. He had shaken hands with a guest who was also at the Ministry of SOEs, then immediately entered the building. It is necessary to know that Pertamina was one of Erick's priorities. Because, Pertamina will develop the Cilacap Refinery with Saudi Aramco.Erick previously targeting the Cilacap Refinery development agreement between Pertamina and Saudi Aramco to take place in December 2019. If not, then the government will look for other alternatives for the development of this refinery. One solution would be to find a new partner for Pertamina. "Until December, we will see whether we agree or not. If not, we will look for other alternatives," Erick said after a meeting at the Coordinating Ministry for Maritime and Investment Affairs, Jakarta, Tuesday (10/29/2019) "We can find other partners too, but we are trying to get what has been agreed by the two countries," continued Erick.
